title: ZeroFox Cloud Platform - Alert Insights
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of ZeroFox Cloud Platform alerts.

definition.content:
[ZeroFox Cloud Platform](https://www.zerofox.com/platform/) is a digital risk protection platform that monitors social, dark web, domains, apps, and collaboration channels to identify brand, executive, and attack surface threats.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of ZeroFox Cloud Platform alerts.

For more information, see the [ZeroFox Cloud Platform Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/zerofox_cloud_platform/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Alerts over Time by Risk Rating
Top Assets With Most Escalated Alerts
Alerts over Time by Assigned User
Alerts by Business Network Protection Status
Alerts Associated with Darkweb Terms over Time

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates ZeroFox Cloud Platform alerts to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
